report.college: BIRLA INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY AND SCIENCE-PILANI, HYDERABAD CAMPUS

invigilator.greeting: Invigilation duty for Prof./ Dr./ Mr./ Ms.
invigilator.intro: You are requested to invigilate for Mid-Semester Examination of the following course(s):

notes.note: Please report at least 15 min. before the commencement of examination to the Instructor-in-charge at his/her chamber
In case of RESERVE duty, please report at TIMETABLE & EXAMS Office (C317)
If you have invigilation duty for Engineering Graphics, the reporting time will be communicated by the Course IC
In courses with less strength, the Instructor-In-Charge is the only invigilator
In case of any problems, contact Office C317 Extn. 802

ic.intro: Details of rooms and invigilators for your course(s) :

notes.note: In courses with less strength, the Instructor-In-Charge is the only invigilator
In case of any problems, contact Office C317 Extn. 802
